price: 6. Thus has the Word of your Lord been justified against those who disbelieved, that they will be the dwellers of the Fire.[1]
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
